articles.title: How to see the solar eclipse - The Verge
articles.description: A total solar eclipse will be visible from North America on April 8th, but you’ll need to find a good vantage point and heed these safety tips to see it.

articles.author: Juan Forero, José de Córdoba
articles.title: U.S. Guns Flow Into Haiti as Gangs Push to Take Control - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Violence in Haiti is ‘apocalyptic,’ U.N. says, as crime gangs obtain handguns and high-powered weapons originating in America
